      population - list of dissimilarity attributes
      neighbors - neighbrhood graph

    • execute_regionalization

      public Object[] execute_regionalization(int cores, int nRows, int nColumns, double threshold, int maxItr, int lengthTabu, double t, double alpha, int convSA, int random, ArrayList<Double> population, ArrayList<Double> household, ArrayList<List> neighbors, ArrayList<String> polygons_strings) throws org.locationtech.jts.io.ParseException
      executes the SMP regionalization
      Parameters:
      cores - number of cores
      nRows - number of rows
      nColumns - number of columns
      threshold - threshold value
      maxItr - maximum iterations for finding the maximum p
      lengthTabu - length of the tabulist
      t - temperature
      alpha - alpha
      convSA - number of iterations for the local search
      random - flag for selecting the area in the region growing
      population - dissimilarity attribute
      household - extensive attribute
      neighbors - neighbrhood graph
      polygons_strings - polygons strings for the areas
      Returns:
      p, areas and their region ID
      Throws:
      org.locationtech.jts.io.ParseException - parse exception for reading the polygons

    • execute_regionalization

      public void execute_regionalization(Map<Integer,Set<Integer>> neighborSet, ArrayList<Long> disAttr, ArrayList<Long> sumAttr, Long threshold)
      overrides the execute_regionalization function
      Specified by:
      execute_regionalization in interface RegionalizationMethod
      Parameters:
      neighborSet - A hashmap. The key is the index of each area. The value is the set of indices of the neighbor areas of the given area. The area index is assumed to be 0 to the number of areas that correspond to the attribute lists.
      disAttr - The list of dissimilarity attributes
      sumAttr - The list of attributes for the summation constraint.
      threshold - the threshold value

      reads the shape files
      Parameters:
      shp_file - shape file path
      string_polygons - to store polygon strings
      areas_polygons - to store polygons
      areas_IDs - to store area IDs
      dissimilarity_attr - to store dissimilarity attributes
      ex_attr - to store extensive attributes
      dissimilarity_attr_col - dissimilarity attribute column name
      ex_attr_col - extensive attribute column name
      Throws:
      IOException - throws IOException when unable to read the shape file
